data.description: Ant/Nant like support for batch building
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I'm not really sure where this should go. Development seems
    logical, but most of that is perl related. This modules is closer to
    a Meta-Make like process. It attempts to do what ant and nant do for
    java and c# respectively, but without the description laguage being
    XML, rather being perl itself. In that sense its making a sort of
    meta language. Its best described as ANT meets Test::More...
